tool_description: Evaluates backup job status and metrics against configurable rules to determine when alerts should be generated and at what severity level.

job_status.description: Current job status (running, completed, failed, waiting, unknown)

job_duration_minutes.description: How long the job has been running or took to complete

expected_duration_minutes.description: Expected duration for this job in minutes

backup_size_mb.description: Size of backup produced or expected

consecutive_failures.description: Number of consecutive failures for this job

critical_failure_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failures before critical alert

storage_warning_threshold.description: Storage utilization percentage for warning alerts

storage_critical_threshold.description: Storage utilization percentage for critical alerts

error_messages: Invalid job status: Use one of [running, completed, failed, waiting, unknown].
Invalid duration: job_duration_minutes and expected_duration_minutes must be positive integers.
Invalid size: backup_size_mb must be a positive number.
Invalid storage percentage: storage_utilization_percent must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid threshold values: All threshold parameters must be positive numbers within reasonable ranges.
Inconsistent thresholds: storage_critical_threshold must be greater than storage_warning_threshold.
usage: Provide current job metrics and status. Adjust threshold parameters to customize alert sensitivity. The engine evaluates all conditions and returns appropriate alert level.

alert_required.description: Whether an alert should be generated

alert_severity.description: Alert severity level (info, warning, critical, none)

triggered_rules.description: List of rule conditions that triggered the alert

alert_message.description: Human-readable alert message describing the issue

recommended_priority.description: Recommended priority level for handling (1-5, with 1 being highest)
